plugin_manifest.name: phloorFlipwall
plugin_manifest.author: void
plugin_manifest.blurb:
This plugin provides a view called 'output/flipwall'. Take a look at 'pages/phloor_flipwall/example.php' to see how its used.
You can specify the 'front' and the 'back'.. so you can use it for anything you want to display. There is already a plugin called 'Phloor Sponsor Flipwall' which requires this plugin and shows how it works. Also in the example.php you see how you can display users.
